file_content.text: Your proof of loyalty has been recorded and filed with Imperial Intelligence. Well done.
Excellent work dealing with those traitors. Report to Inquisitor Arzanon for debriefing.
I recommend you do not disappoint Inquisitor Arzanon. He is not a forgiving man.
Inquisitor Arzanon wishes to speak with you.
I'm here strictly as an observer, acolyte. You should direct all your inquiries to Master Arzanon.
Your presence on Korriban has been logged by Imperial Intelligence. Behave yourself while you're here.
